title: Kai Pesi Lyrics Thillu Mullu Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Ranjith
Song: Kai Pesi
Movie: Thillu Mullu
Music: Yuvan		 .
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Kai pesi en kooda sollaamaley
kai veesi sendraaley nillaamaley
naan indru kandeney moondram pirai
podhaadhu naan vazhum kaalam varai

Avalin azhagu analai vidavum
adhigam kodhikudhey
kodhika kodhika kushiyil ennadhu
idhayam kudhikudhey

Yaar meedhu kaadhal, eppodhu pookum
yaar solla koodum, sollaamal thaakum
en jadhagam kadhal yogam

Kai pesi en kooda sollaamaley
kai veesi sendraaley nillaamaley
naan indru kandeney moondram pirai
podhaadhu naan vazhum kaalam varai

Idhayathil yaarkum idamillai endru
dhinasari thazh pottu naan pootinen
udaithadhu neeye ul pugundhaye
thalaividhi un kaiyil naan maatinen

Ulagellaam urangayil uyirai nee
thayirai pol kadaikiraau
unarchiyil kirangayil
manadhai nee malar vandaai kudaikiraai

Ennakena neethaan ezhudhidum kadidham
padikiren anbae un facebook-il thaan
Adikadi naan thaan nilai thadumaari
vizhugiren un kannin grace look-il thaan

Vidai illaa kelvi nee
nilakari oolal pol neelgiraai
thadaigalai thagarthu nee
adimayai arasi pol aalgiraai

Kai pesi en kooda sollaamaley
kai veesi sendraaley nillaamaley
naan indru kandeney moondram pirai
podhaadhu naan vazhum kaalam varai

Avalin azhagu analai vidavum
adhigam kodhikudhey
kodhika kodhika kushiyil ennadhu
idhayam kudhikudhey

Yaar meedhu kaadhal, eppodhu pookum
yaar solla koodum, sollaamal thaakum
en jadhagam kadhal yogam

Kai pesi en kooda sollaamaley...English Translation
I tried my best :)
